quiz.question: Which collective noun is used for actors performing together in a play?
Which collective noun describes a gathering of vultures circling thermals?
Which obscure collective noun names a gathering of lapwings in fields?
Which colorful collective noun describes a gathering of flamingos?
Which collective noun describes a line of migrating geese in flight?
Which rare collective noun refers to a group of moles tunneling in the ground?
Which collective noun names a group of dolphins or whales?
Which bird forms spectacular murmurations of thousands of individuals?
Which unusual collective noun is used for a group of choughs in historical lists?
Which collective noun names a group of wolves commonly used in English?
Which collective noun describes a group of seals on a shore or rocks?
Which collective noun names a group of swifts gathering at dusk?
Which collective noun refers to a group of monkeys observed together?
Which collective noun refers to a group of penguins standing on a breeding site?
Which collective noun historically describes a group of whales observed from a whaler's perspective?
